  • Log Out
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from '../authentication/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-menu', templateUrl: './nav-menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-menu.component.css'] }) export class NavMenuComponent { isExpanded = false; constructor(private authService: AuthService) { } collapse() { this.isExpanded = false; } toggle() { this.isExpanded = !this.isExpanded; } isAuthenticated() { return this.authService.isAuthenticated(); } logout() { localStorage.clear(); this.authService.logout() .subscribe(response => { if (response.success) { console.log("Response: ", response.message); } }) } }
